meanings.definition: A group of extinct carnivorous mammals.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit about the creodont.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of creodonts to learn more about ancient predators.
meanings.sent3: The children were amazed by the size of the creodont skeleton in the museum.
meanings.sent4: In the prehistoric era, the creodont ruled as the top predator.
meanings.sent5: The creodont's sharp teeth and powerful jaws made it a fearsome hunter.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the creodonts.
meanings.sent1: The researcher made a creodont-related discovery in the fossil record.
meanings.sent2: The creodont features in the ancient cave paintings were striking.
meanings.sent3: The creodont-inspired artwork added a unique touch to the exhibit.
meanings.sent4: Her fierce determination was as strong as a creodont's instinct to hunt.
